retinol.reason: High doses of Vitamin A derivatives like retinol have been linked to birth defects.
retinol.source: American College of Obstetricians and Gynecologists (ACOG)

hydroquinone.reason: Significant systemic absorption. Potential risks are not well-studied, so avoidance is recommended.

formaldehyde.reason: Known carcinogen with potential risks to fetal development.

soft cheese (unpasteurized).reason: Risk of Listeria contamination, which can be dangerous during pregnancy.
